data.title: Oxford American
data.text:
BIG NEWS: The Whiting Foundation will match your gift of $1,000 or more, doubling your contribution. Help us reach our $20,000 goal. Your generosity today ensures the South’s vibrant voices have a place to call home for generations to come.

About

Jonathan Lethem is the author of eleven novels, including The Fortress of Solitude and The Feral Detective. His music writing has appeared in Rolling Stone, the New Yorker, and the 33 1/3 series, for which he wrote about Talking Heads’ Fear of Music. He lives in Los Angeles and Maine.
